pages.text: Ni$ Nerra itran deg igenni. Ncebbee iten i wid ipmuqulen
Nesdari ten, si yal cciian imenfi
Kkes ed win d issemeessen s tufra, A p iddu, fellas, ujajie n uuee
Tamurt Nessewsaa p; Nerra fellas idurar; Nessem$i d, degs, yal cci, s lmizan
Nerra, degs, lqut i kunwi, akw i wid ur tecceccayem ara
Lexzayen n yal cci, $uoneÂ£ kan. Siwa s lkil ipwassnen i ten id Nesrusu
Nuzen ed avu isswayen. Nesse$li d aman seg igenni, yissen Nessew ikwen. Ur llin ara lexzayen is $uowen
Ih, d Nekwni i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. D Nekwni ay d Iweooaten
Ni$ Nessen imezwura nnwen, Nessen ineggura
Ih, Mass ik, Neppa, a ten id Ifser. Ih, Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ Nexleq amdan si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Nexleq loenn, iu$ leal, si tmes n ccili
Mi Inna Mass ik, i lmalayek: "Nek Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Mi t Mesle$, u Uuuve$ as si ooue iW, ersemt $uoes, knumt
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis, iugi ad yili ar wid iknan
